info.description: Personal online platform providing information about media content
info.title: Ozinshe Production

get.description: Retrieves a list of all ages

500.description: Failed to save poster or create age

get.description: Retrieves an age by its ID

put.description: Updates an existing age by ID

delete.description: Deletes an age by its ID

get.description: Retrieves a category by its ID

put.description: Updates an existing category by ID

delete.description: Deletes a category by its ID

get.description: Retrieve all genres from the database

post.description: Create a new genre and upload a poster

get.description: Retrieve a genre by its ID

put.description: Update a genre's details, including its title and poster

delete.description: Delete a genre from the database by its ID

get.description: Get a list of all movie types

post.description: Create a new movie type with the specified name

get.description: Get a movie type by its ID

put.description: Update an existing movie type by its ID

delete.description: Delete a movie type by its ID

get.description: Get a list of all movies

post.description: Create a new movie with the specified information

get.description: Get a movie by its ID

delete.description: Delete a movie by its ID

patch.description: Update an existing movie by its ID
Upload cover and screenshots for a movie

post.description: Adds a new season with episodes to a movie
post.summary: Add seasons and episodes to a movie

put.description: Updates an existing season's details and episodes

400.description: Invalid movieId or seasonId or payload

delete.description: Removes a season and its episodes from a movie
delete.summary: Delete a season from a movie

get.description: Get a list of all roles

post.description: Create a new role with specified permissions

get.description: Get the details of a specific role by ID

put.description: Update an existing role with new information

delete.description: Delete an existing role by ID
Removes an episode from a season

get.description: Retrieve a list of all users
Retrieve a user by their ID

delete.description: Delete a user by their ID

put.description: Assign a role to a user by their ID
put.summary: Assign a role to a user

post.description: Authenticates a user by verifying the email and password, and returns a JWT token

401.description: Invalid credentials: wrong email or password

500.description: Internal server error: failed to generate JWT token

post.description: Invalidates the user's current session (requires a valid JWT token)
Registers a new user by providing an email, password, and password confirmation

400.description: Validation error: invalid email, password mismatch, or weak password

500.description: Server error: failed to hash password or create user

get.description: Retrieves a list of all categories

put.description: Allows a user to change their password

get.description: Retrieves a user profile by ID

put.description: Updates the details of a user profile by ID

Bearer.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
Bearer.name: Authorization
